text: I would be willing to put in at least $50 a month into a "FoC fund". I don't have strong opinions on how exactly it should work, but perhaps we can first gather proposals to see what level of funding would be needed to make a significant difference (e.g. enough funding to work on a project full time)

text: I’m happy to submit a detailed proposal any time :woman-shrugging:
